publications: [{"title":"Amazon Clone App","date":"September 10, 2023","description":"• Developed a fully functional Amazon clone web application using React.js, showcasing expertise in frontend development and user interface design.• Implemented essential features such as product listing, search functionality, shopping cart, and user authentication, creating a seamless and engaging shopping experience for users.• Utilized modern web development technologies like React Hooks and Context API to manage state efficiently, resulting in optimized performance and smooth user interactions.• Employed Firebase for backend functionalities such as user authentication and real-time database, demonstrating proficiency in integrating frontend with backend services."},{"title":"Insights with Datasthan #30Days30Companies","date":"August 1, 2021","description":"“Insights with Datasthan #30Days30Companies” is a blog project about 30 different companies, where I'm learning and documenting how these companies leverage the power of data, how do they perform data analytics, what is making them different from others, and why I am fascinated to work with them."}]
